description: React component for displaying detailed information about a single product, including handling 'product not found' scenario, and rendering product info with images, categories, sizes, colors, tags, and actions.

methods.name: ProductDetail()
methods.description: React functional component that displays detailed information about a product based on URL parameter 'id'. Handles product not found case and renders product details including media, category, name, price, description, available options, and action buttons.
